alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:29PM EDT until August 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEWIS COUNTY... At 825 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whetstone Gulf State Park, or 15 miles north of Boonville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whetstone Gulf State Park, Highmarket, Watson, Martinsburg, Lyonsdale, Greig, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Constableville, and Turin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a tornado! A tornado warning is in effect for a portion of this warned area. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
